storyInfo: With a mutiny underway, old allies have turned their blades on each other, family and fellow have become enemies, soldiers of Sargon have become rebels, and in the midst of all this, Heavyrain is trapped in a dilemma.

attributes.content: In the blood-red glow of the fire, each person is reduced to a vague silhouette, cast over the mottled ruins.
Once they fought side by side, through the valley of the shadow of death.
Yet now, only hatred and animosity remain in their gazes towards one another.
(What happened...?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (It's like... everyone went crazy.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Allaenat!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Do you even realize the hell I went through getting back here alive? And before I get even a single hot meal, you want me rushing off to the front lines again?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Fall back! All of you, fall back!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Is this a mutiny?!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Mutiny? I'm gonna kill you, ayyuha al'ahmaq.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Grab him! Don't let him get away!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Move it! Out of the way!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Heavyrain! Quick!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Stop him! Don't let him run!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (I think I know who he is...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (What was he called again?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What are you spacing out for?! Kill him!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: MOVE!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Damn it!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Heavyrain, how could you let him get away?!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (All my comrades are staring at me. They look so hostile.) I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (It's like... I'm their enemy now too.) But I don't hurt my comrades.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Comrades? Heh...
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: You think any of those sacks of shit on our side?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: His punch hits Heavyrain square in the face.
The veteran pants insatiably, just waiting for Heavyrain to hit back, dying to vent his anger in combat.
But she doesn't. She simply picks up her shield, her expression calm.
No hesitation, nor any show of fear.
I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: But I will never hurt my comrades.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *spit*! Coward.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Enough! This is no time to be screwing with our own.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Boss, we should make a break for it.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: While we still have the chance.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Run? What about our families back home?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: We're all brothers from the same hometown. If the lord ameer ever feels like going after them, his job will be easy.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Allaenat!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Those bastards were never going to let us live in the first place.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: I told you to think before you act. Do you regret it now?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: I can't take this. I can't watch my brothers be thrown out to die like this.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Enough, words won't solve this anymore. They can defend the entrance for now.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: The janissaries and officers are all the children of nobles. With them as hostages, whoever's outside... won't be so quick to act.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: The years-long campaign has taken these people—far from their homes and their families—and left them with no one but their fellow troops.
It's only natural for those from the same hometown to look after one another, unable to bear their companions suffering even the slightest abuse.
But under such innately oppressive circumstances, strife still remains common.
You cowards screwed up last time by being the first to run. I had the enemy tear at my ass for three whole days before I made it out.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Khalas! Who are you calling a coward?!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: If it wasn't for you shit for brains, I wouldn't even be trapped in here!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Say that again, ya waghadi?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Wanna go, huh? Bring it! Put your money where your mouth is!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Fine, let's go!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Not going to help? You're just going to watch?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Who would I help?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Who do you care about more?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Then who do you think is in the right?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: They... none of them.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Sargonian mercenaries shouldn't be fighting each other for no reason like this.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: ...*sigh* I knew you weren't like the others, Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: There's no should or shouldn't when it comes to soldiers...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Only want or don't want, obey or disobey.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: How come you got even less food than me?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Don't vets get a little more?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: It's fine. It's enough.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Having more or less doesn't make a difference.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Anum sort of looks like she's in despair.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Is she worried for me?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Anum.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: To tell the truth...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I knew the person who ran this afternoon.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You did? But the janissaries never associate with people like us.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: In our last battle, it was me who pulled him out from a pile of bodies.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: He told me his name was Ibrahim.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: We hid from the Casters pursuing us together.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: So he's your friend?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Not a friend. A comrade.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What's the difference?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: ...It's hard to put in words.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: But they're not the same.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Do you remember how this whole mess started?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: The officer got the order to send everyone back to the front.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: And then?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: The veterans felt they were too injured from the last battle and wanted more supplies and rest. Then it got out of hand.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: So, who do you think was in the right?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I understand what the veterans are thinking, but...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Regardless, you hesitated.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: And to the others, it felt like a betrayal.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I'd never betray anyone.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I just don't understand...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: We save him one moment, and then we have to kill him the next.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then what if it was someone else running toward you back there?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Someone who'd clashed with you before, even.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Would you retaliate then? Would you want to?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If I said no, would you think I'm a coward, Anum?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No... Because I knew you'd say that.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You see everyone as a comrade.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Because we are. Because we're Sargonian soldiers. Because we swore an oath.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: 'Never kneel to the enemy in the face of danger. Never abandon your comrades in times of need.'
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Personal grudges and desires... don't really matter to me much.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Look at this food they gave us!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You could turn the plate upside down and it wouldn't fall off!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Stop messing with it. If it does fall, you'll have nothing to eat.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Mm-hmm.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If that happened, would you give me yours?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Because I'm your comrade?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Because you're my friend.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Friend, comrade... you keep repeating those words.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Is there really a difference?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.text: Devotion? Honor? Oaths? Is there a point?
Can you rebels inside hear me?!
Everyone here is an ordinary Sargonian! We fight to put food on the table, to support our families. That's all we want!
Drop your weapons and surrender immediately! Free the hostages!
You don't even care how many of our brothers died in that battle.
Fine... we're all dead either way.

attributes.content: Heavyrain.
Wake up.
(Hostiles?!)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (No!) What happened?!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Lower your blade...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: It's me, no need to panic.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Dammit... that was too dangerous.) Oh...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Good thing I didn't hurt Anum.) I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: It's fine. But I need your help right now.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Here's the situation. Neither of their fevers are breaking, and they've been shaking the whole time.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If we don't cure them ASAP, they're dead for sure.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Their wounds haven't been treated at all.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (There's so much rot.) What do you need me to do?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: The vets are watching all the supplies, and refuse to help in any way.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I assume you know where they keep them. Can you think of a way to bring anything back?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: They're your comrades, after all.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Comrades...) You don't need to convince me.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Did she really have to stress it like that?) I'll go and try.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: If you didn't stop me just now, I swear I would've taken them on.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Can we trust her?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Have faith. Heavyrain's a good person.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: She gave her word, so she'll do it.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: A good person?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: There's no such thing as a good person in the army, only fools and idiots.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Shit, we've been noticed!
Deal with them! Don't make too much noise.
Wait! We're in a tough spot too!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: So... can we make a deal?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (So dark...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I know this is where they put the medicine...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (These are the bandages, so the disinfectant should be right next to them.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Who's there?
(Oh, no... I can't let them find me.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Just hide this stuff in my clothes...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What was that noise?! Who is it?!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: I'm looking for something.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Heavyrain, was it meds you took?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: All by yourself?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: (He's turning off the lights?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (What is he going to do?!)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Relax, you don't want anyone else finding you here, right?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Okay, so what's going on? Who's hurt?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: (Should I tell him?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (If I just leave, will he stop me?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: If you don't want to say... the door's over here. Be sure not to make any more noise.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Two recruits have... untreated wounds. They have high fevers.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What meds did you take?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: These.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hm... disinfectant and bandages. You know how to treat wounds, then?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Yes. I've learned before.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Good. Remember to remove anything that's rotting.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: We're out of anesthetics... They'll just have to grin and bear it.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Take these antibiotics too, they'll be key to saving their lives. That's about all I can give you, though.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Obviously, it'd be best to get them to a hospital. But clearly that's not on the table.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: See you, then.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Wait, Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Are you hurt? Do you feel bad anywhere?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *sigh*... I remember trying to reason with your mother, when she handed you over to me.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: You were barely out of diapers...
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Never mind. Hurry. Stay out of sight on your way back.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Can I ask something?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Abi?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Huh? What?
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: Where's this coming from? You haven't called me that in years.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: We swore, before, that we'd root out all of Sargon's enemies.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: But now it's Sargonian soldiers surrounding us.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: It's Sargonian soldiers we're holding hostage.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Everyone here's a Sargonian soldier, and they fight each other every day.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Who is our enemy? What is an enemy?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What do I... do?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Let me ask you something first.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: If I was hurt, you would help me too, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Definitely.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Because we're Sargonian soldiers. We never abandon our comrades.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then suppose I wasn't your comrade, and I wasn't wearing this uniform.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: I was just some stranger, begging for your aid. Would you help me?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then what if I asked you to risk your life to rescue me?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Put everything on the line to help a stranger. Would you?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: To put it frankly, serving Sargon, eh... it just means you wear these clothes. Seems like they're all that ties us together.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: But even without them, you'd still be you, I'd still be me, and anyone'd still be anyone. Everyone has their own identities, their own perspectives, their own goals.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Even you. You have little ideas of your own, don't you? You'd risk your life to steal meds for your comrades.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: ...was only doing it because...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hahaha, I know.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You're a good kid. You regard every soldier as an comrade.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: But what about if you took off the uniform? Who are you then?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: (If I left this uniform behind, if I wasn't a Sargonian soldier anymore...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (What would I do?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Go home?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Enough, I'd better get back to checking on the lookouts.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Heavyrain... take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: I will...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Abi.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: We can execute traitors on the spot. What matters most is we ensure the hostages are safe.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Will you keep your word? That if we work with you...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If you're willing to turn back and cease this crime of betraying the lord ameer...
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Then I trust our superiors will reconsider your punishment.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: ...They... We all got dragged into this, no one asked us.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: We never intended to betray the lord ameer!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: I swear!!!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: The only thing that matters is how you choose to act.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Anum, someone's coming!
attributes.name: Timid Recruit

attributes.content: We can't wait for you forever.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Make up your minds.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: I'm back. How are they?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Still running a high fever. Did you find the meds?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Yeah. Help me redress their wounds.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: They need to tough it out. I have to cut away all the rotting parts.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then get them to take these antibiotics.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain...
attributes.name: Gutless Recruit

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Gutless Recruit

attributes.content: It's nothing.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Anum, come and help me undo their old bandages.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You treat their wounds. I'll get some people to fetch things.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Whisper) You, all of you, come with me.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: This is our last chance. Are you in?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: But the veterans...
attributes.name: Timid Recruit

attributes.content: You're scared, aren't you?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Do you want to die here? With those idiots?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: How about the rest of you, then?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: ...Do you really think we have a chance? It's not like we outnumber them.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: And will the lord ameer really let us go?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: You said it yourself, didn't you? What's the difference between us, when we all make our livings as soldiers?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Or do you want to explain to the people outside how you're innocent while they have a blade against your throat?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Khalas! Fine. Lead the way.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Your friend there, is she going to help us?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Heavyrain... I'll ask her.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If it comes down to it...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You're going to kill her? Isn't she your friend?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: She is, and a good person too.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: But she can never figure out where she stands, or what matters. She's too nice to everyone.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You said it yourself, didn't you?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: There's no such thing as a good person in the army, only fools and idiots.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You got me there.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: What... What are you looking at me for?!
attributes.name: Timid Recruit

attributes.content: I... I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Timid Recruit

attributes.content: Their wounds are redressed now, and they've taken the drugs.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Their foreheads aren't as hot anymore.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Something's not right about Anum's expression.) They'll recover.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: If the war ends, and you leave the army, what would you want to do?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Where's this coming from?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I... haven't thought about it.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You've really never considered what you want to do? Or who you care about?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: What I want to do...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Who I care about...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: And everyone else...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh, honestly, Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Everyone here is gauging me. They're looking to see how I react.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (And they're packing their gear.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Anum, if there's something you want to say...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You can just tell me.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then if I asked you to help me capture the mutinying soldiers, would you say yes?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Regardless of what you think, you're out of options. We're all enemies of Sargon at this point.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: But just now, we were lucky enough to get one last chance.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: We can survive this.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Is that really lucky?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Survive...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (For a reason like that, and nothing else...) Is there no other way?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You can't avoid the problem anymore.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You treat them as comrades, but they don't see you that way.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Do you still not get it?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (The way they treat me...) I do.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (...doesn't really matter...) But I don't mind.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I just can't do it. Not when it's just to survive.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Then I'll do it for you.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (Am I too weak...?) Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Are we killing her?
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: I'll be honest, I've been afraid of you stabbing me in the back at some point.
attributes.name: Dispirited Straggler

attributes.content: Tie her up.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Right... She did save our lives, after all.
attributes.name: Timid Recruit

attributes.content: Heavyrain, you were never weak. You're just shackled by that oath of yours.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: The lord ameer doesn't want you to have your own desires. The officers are scared of seeing your hatred.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You're a good person.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: So this time, I'll do it for you.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: But you owe me one.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Because you promised you'd protect me.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Because I want to survive.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I want to survive with you.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: What's that little wench's problem?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: She's been with us for half a year now and she still doesn't talk. She just stands there by herself, watching us.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Children are scared of strangers.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: She's a good person, once you get to know her.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Girl!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Get over here, help us out.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (Does he mean me?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Go, take this roll call. You see that lost-looking bunch over there?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Them. Go fetch those recruits.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (It's another new batch.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (It hasn't been a month since the last one.) Okay.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Are you a vet here?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (She's younger than me.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You see this gold star?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: This is a spoil of war. I got it from some ruins.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I'll give this to you, so protect me if they try to bully me, okay?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Huh? Because I hear the vets always bully the new recruits here.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: But from where I'm standing, you seem different.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: No, I mean, why give this to me?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: It's yours. I don't need it.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: And besides, I wouldn't bully my own comrades.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You're a weird one.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I'm Anum.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: ...I'm Heavyrain.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Now, back to your unit, please.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: The choking scent of smoke—and the familiar-yet-terrifying battle cries—bring Heavyrain out of her daze in a snap.
Instinctively, she tries to reach for her weapon, but quickly discovers that she has been bound fast to a pillar.
(Dammit... Anum, you impulsive bastard...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I have to find her...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Tear gas fills the room.
Heavyrain grits her teeth and after some effort dislocates her own arm to writhe it free of the rope. Her clenched jaw manages to stop her from screaming in pain.
Death to the rebels!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: (No matter what, I need to find Anum, and Abi.) Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Anum... where is she?) Abi!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Heavy breathing) Huff... huff...
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Hahaha, we're all comrades, huh?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: *spit*! You betrayed us after all.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (Betrayed?) You...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I didn't...) I'll treat your wounds.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Haram alayk, trying to trick me like the hypocrite you are.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: You think I'm your path to glory?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Bring it!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (We lived and died as comrades...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Now we fight to the end as enemies?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Allaenat, I'll go out with honor!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: And you? Selling out your own comrades to survive?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (I was never going to sell anyone out...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Everyone's treating me as an enemy...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Honor? Oaths? You're nothing but a coward!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: You're just scared to do wrong, scared of being blamed, scared to be a bad person.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: And for what? Even if my brothers choose wrong, I'd still give everything I have for them! I don't fear it!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: There's no true right or wrong when you're a soldier, anyway.
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Come. Aren't you going to kill me?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: Even if I die, I have my brothers with me. Lucky me!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: What about you? What's waiting for you, even if you survive?
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: *spit*!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: ...You're right.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain, you were never weak. You're just shackled by that oath of yours.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: So this time, I'll do it for you.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: (My parents always told me to obey, to listen.) I never did wrong at home. I tried hard to show them I was a good kid, but in the end I was still kicked out.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Because our harvest was bad, and we couldn't survive. No other reason.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Oaths, virtue, honor...) I think of everyone as a comrade, and try to help them, and I'm scared of doing the wrong thing.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (...are they really just lies here?) But even so, this is how it all turned out...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: If it's like you say... there's no should or shouldn't, no right or wrong...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Just like Anum said.) Then I'm willing to bear it... to bear all of the consequences for Anum.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I'll protect her.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Forgive me.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Agh!!
attributes.name: Sargonian Veteran

attributes.content: (I can just use my shield...) Huff...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I don't need to actually kill him.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Where are you?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Once we have you, this entire clown show will be over.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: We'll all still have a chance to survive.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Survive? Aren't you a greedy one...
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: You're not fit to be a soldier of Sargon.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: A soldier?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: You really think anyone gives a damn?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Drop dead.
attributes.name: Old Captain

attributes.content: (Dammit...) Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (Why did it have to be Abi...) Abi?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Help me.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Made up your mind?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: (I'm sorry...) Abi, I didn't want it to be this way.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (If there was any other choice...) But Anum's my friend, so...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I can't let you hurt her.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Friend...
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Hahahaha! Come on! Show me then!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain! Watch out!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I'm coming!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Move it!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Argh!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Abi!!!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: For your friend's sake, eh! Good on you!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Now again, Heavyrain!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You're not going to defeat me just by defending. You know.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You're still wavering?
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You need to protect your friend, and right now, I'm your enemy.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: (The worst outcome...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain! Dammit... ufff...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Guys! Help us!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Seize the traitor!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: *sigh*... Looks like we're out of time.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You'll have to forgive me for taking the reins, then.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Agh!!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain!
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: The finishing blow!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: (We're going to die...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (No!) Aaaaarrgh!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Come!!!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Abi slashed at Heavyrain. Heavyrain lifts her shield with all she has, every drop of strength poured into her charge against him.
Yet in the single moment her view is blocked...
The old vet...
Turns his blade...
And plunges it into his own body.
NO!!!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: WHY?! Abi!!!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Why are you doing this?!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Take my blade.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Take it! Quick!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: While they still haven't noticed.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: No! I won't!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: The warehouse! There's still meds there!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Astamaʿa li!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Al-'aan! I'm telling you to take it!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: TAKE IT!
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Abi...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heavyrain, you're a good child.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You protect your comrades, care for your friends, even watch out for my useless old ass.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: I'm so... very happy.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Stop it...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... If you're willing to see everyone as a comrade, to help them, to lay your personal grudges to rest...
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Then you're so much stronger than us elderly morons... but still... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Never let yourself be so easily bound. Be firm in your own steps.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: You're a good child, I trust that.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: But there are times, when kindness is a little inappropriate, that's all.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I know...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Abi...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Don't let it weigh you down. Whatever else, we need someone left to bring our letters back.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: After so long away, it's about time we old men... went home.
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: These tags––these comrades... you protect them well. I believe in you...
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: Bring... *cough* *cough*... everyone...
attributes.name: Abi

attributes.content: No! Abi!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Dammit... Heavyrain...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Move aside! Everyone move aside!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Any more fighting, and you'll all be executed on the spot!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Stay away from Anum, or I'll take you on myself!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Don't be scared, Anum!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Enough! Do you not think your crimes are sufficiently grave yet?
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: Unit 0374! You have betrayed the lord ameer, and spurned your soldier's oath.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: This is your last chance to wash yourselves of guilt!
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: We hope for you to prove your loyalty through your actions in this assignment.
attributes.name: Sargonian Janissary

attributes.content: *sigh*... And here I thought we might have a chance to live.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: I should have expected that the lord ameer was never going to let us go.
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Now what?
attributes.name: Anum

attributes.content: Don't be afraid.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Nobody is allowed to hurt you, no matter who it is.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I'll bring everyone home, together.)
attributes.name: Heavyrain
